Matthew Peixoto

Moments

Finding a few moments each day to take a few deep breaths and quiet your mind is a great way to relieve stress and improve your overall health. The Moments app and necklace work together to help you decompress and stay centred throughout your busy day by tracking your breathing, analyzing your heart rate, and guiding you through moments of complete mindfulness.

Ideation

A simple app for a busy life.

Designed for all

Moments was designed for people who live busy lives. Whether it be a business owner worrying about their business or a student studying for exams — anyone can benefit from taking some time to just be in the moment.

Interface

Material design. Now more zen.

Symbolism

In Zen, ensō is a circle that is hand-drawn in one or two uninhibited brush strokes to express a moment when the mind is free to let the body create.

Colour

Moments' colour palette is inspired by calming nature elements to help soothe the body and mind.

Primary
Secondary
Accent

Iconography

Material icons are beautifully crafted, delightful, and easily recognizable.

Typography

Roboto delivers a familiar and unified experience and allows Moments' beautiful visuals to take center stage.

Experience

An experience to forget.

Reach your goals

Set a daily moment goal and close your ensō by taking moments throughout your day.

Review your day

See at which times in your day you were feeling calm, focused, and tense.

Take a moment

Quiet your mind and relax your body as Moments guides you through a moment of complete mindfulness.

View your history

See the progress you've made, review specific days, and stay on track to complete every day’s ensō.

Earn awards

Earn awards for completing various tasks along your journey to a more mindful and stress-free life.
